mainText: Education based on an individual approach to each student. A unique education system based on modern teaching methods. Experienced teachers.
helpPlace: Wonder Kids is not just a place to study, but a place where each child receives personal support and attention.
keySuccess: 30+ teachers are the key to our students' success.
ourTeamTeachers: Our school's teachers are experienced professionals who are inspired by their duties.
content1: Welcome to our private school - a place where each pupil discovers their potential through modern techniques and a personal approach.
content2: We combine academic quality, support, and individual attention to create a solid foundation for a successful future.
method3: Education at our school is based on a step-by-step system of comprehensive development and international standards.
method5: Students complete assignments together with their teachers, which allows them to better understand the topics. The assignments are simple, clear, and explained in child-friendly language.
method7: They will study core subjects in depth, including foreign languages, natural sciences, and technology. They will further develop critical thinking and research skills.
method9: Preparation for universities: choosing a professional direction, intensive preparation for international exams (IELTS, SAT), and creating projects
event3: The course includes basics of programming, learning algorithms, creating websites and mobile applications, and implementing cybersecurity. It’s a great opportunity for students to gain in-demand skills in the rapidly growing tech industry.
event5: Classical karate training helps students improve physical fitness, develop endurance, strength, and coordination. Karate also fosters discipline, respect, and self-confidence.
event7: The chess club helps students develop strategic thinking, logic, and patience. Playing chess enhances concentration and teaches thoughtful decision-making — valuable both on the board and in life.
event9: Table tennis training helps develop agility, reaction speed, and coordination. It also builds endurance and focus, supporting both physical and mental development.
event11: This course includes visual arts, painting, sculpture, and decorative crafts. Students enhance their creativity and learn to express their ideas and emotions through various artistic techniques.
contactForm3: Leave your phone number and we will answer all your questions or call our number!
contactForm7: Which grade is your child going to?
contactForm14: Name must be at least 4 characters
choice3: Our school is not just a place to study, but a space where every child receives personal support and attention.
choice4: We take pride in a unique combination of traditional education and innovative approaches that help develop students' academic skills.
choice6: Balanced and healthy meals prepared by qualified chefs, fully meeting healthy nutrition standards to support children's energy and well-being.
choice8: Students complete assignments under the guidance of teachers, gaining help and explanations to better understand the material.
choice10: Trips are organized by school bus to scientific, entertaining (amusement parks), cultural (theatre, cinema, concerts, etc.), and historical places.
choice12: Ensures convenient and safe transportation of students from home to school and back. Operated by professional drivers for a safe and comfortable journey.
footer5: Landmark: Near Emergency Medical Service, opposite School No. 46
agenda4: English, Russian, Math, Native Language, and Computer Science lessons.
